Name: :math:`V_\text{SPIL}^{t,~b}`
Description: Spilled water volumes when basins are full

Name: :math:`dV_\text{+}^{h}`
Description: Positive difference bertween powered water volume sepoints and calculated

Name: :math:`dV_\text{-}^{h}`
Description: Positive difference bertween powered water volume sepoints and calculated

Name: :math:`P^{t,~h}`
Description: Electrical power produced (or consumed) by a hydropower plant

Name: :math:`Q^{t,~h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a hydropower plant

Name: :math:`S_\text{BAS}^{t,~b,~s_b}`
Description: Binary variable that indicates the basin's volume state derived from its volume:  :math:`S_\text{BAS}^{t,~b,~s_b} = \begin{cases} 1 \text{ if } V_\text{BAS}^{t,~b} \in  \left[ V_\text{BAS, MIN}^{b,~s_b} ;V_\text{BAS, MAX}^{b,~s_b} \right] \\ 0 \text{ otherwise} \end{cases}`

Name: :math:`S_\text{FLOW}^{t,~h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Binary variable that indicates the hydo power plant's flow state (for turbine and pump)

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, S}^{t,~h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Basin volume seen by hydropowerplant states : :math:`V_\text{BAS, S}^{t,~h,~s_h,~s_q}  = \begin{cases} V_\text{BAS}^{t,~b_h} \text{ if } S_\text{FLOW}^{t,~h,~s_h,~s_q} = 1 \\ 0 \text{ otherwise} \end{cases}`
